resources.title: Euclid's Elements
resources.author: Euclid (translated by Thomas Heath)
resources.description: The foundational text of geometry, online with commentary.

resources.title: The Princeton Companion to Mathematics
resources.author: Timothy Gowers, June Barrow-Green, Imre Leader (eds.)
resources.description: Comprehensive reference covering all major areas of pure and applied mathematics. Essential for understanding the landscape of modern mathematics.

resources.title: Principles of Mathematical Analysis (Baby Rudin)
resources.author: Walter Rudin
resources.description: Classic rigorous introduction to real analysis. The standard text for undergraduate analysis courses.

resources.title: Linear Algebra Done Right
resources.author: Sheldon Axler
resources.description: Modern approach to linear algebra emphasizing abstract vector spaces over determinants.

resources.title: An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers
resources.author: G.H. Hardy and E.M. Wright
resources.description: The classic comprehensive introduction to number theory, covering prime numbers, congruences, and more.

resources.title: Abstract Algebra
resources.author: David Dummit and Richard Foote
resources.description: Comprehensive text on groups, rings, fields, and Galois theory. Standard graduate reference.

resources.title: Calculus
resources.author: Michael Spivak
resources.description: Rigorous single-variable calculus with emphasis on proofs. Bridges calculus and analysis.

resources.title: Visual Complex Analysis
resources.author: Tristan Needham
resources.description: Revolutionary geometric approach to complex analysis with beautiful illustrations.

resources.title: Topology
resources.author: James Munkres
resources.description: Standard introduction to point-set and algebraic topology.

resources.title: Naive Set Theory
resources.author: Paul Halmos
resources.description: Elegant introduction to set theory, the foundation of modern mathematics.

resources.title: A First Course in Probability
resources.author: Sheldon Ross
resources.description: Clear introduction to probability theory with many applications and examples.

resources.title: The Art of Computer Programming
resources.author: Donald Knuth
resources.description: Monumental work on algorithms and their mathematical analysis.

resources.title: 3Blue1Brown - Essence of Linear Algebra
resources.author: Grant Sanderson
resources.description: Visually stunning explanations of linear algebra fundamentals.

resources.title: 3Blue1Brown - Essence of Calculus
resources.author: Grant Sanderson
resources.description: Visual intuition for derivatives, integrals, and the fundamental theorem.

resources.title: Khan Academy Mathematics
resources.author: Khan Academy
resources.description: Comprehensive free courses from arithmetic through calculus and beyond.

resources.title: MIT OpenCourseWare - Mathematics
resources.author: MIT
resources.description: Free university-level mathematics courses with lecture notes and problem sets.

resources.title: How to Prove It
resources.author: Daniel Velleman
resources.description: Essential guide to understanding and writing mathematical proofs.

resources.title: What Is Mathematics?
resources.author: Richard Courant and Herbert Robbins
resources.description: Classic overview of mathematics written for intelligent laypersons, updated by Ian Stewart.

resources.title: GÃ¶del, Escher, Bach
resources.author: Douglas Hofstadter
resources.description: Pulitzer Prize-winning exploration of logic, self-reference, and intelligence.

resources.title: The Mathematical Experience
resources.author: Philip Davis and Reuben Hersh
resources.description: Accessible exploration of what mathematicians actually do and how mathematics develops.

resources.title: Awesome Math (Curated Resource Index)
resources.author: Cyrille Rossant and contributors
resources.description: Curated index of free mathematics resources across algebra, analysis, geometry, topology, probability, and more.

resources.title: ProofWiki
resources.author: ProofWiki contributors
resources.description: Crowdsourced repository of mathematical definitions, theorems, and proofs with cross-linked dependencies.

resources.title: Wolfram MathWorld
resources.author: Eric W. Weisstein
resources.description: Comprehensive encyclopedia of mathematical objects and results with formulas and references.

resources.title: Open Logic Project
resources.author: Open Logic contributors
resources.description: Open-source textbook covering formal logic, proofs, and semantics with modular chapters.

resources.title: Interactive Linear Algebra
resources.author: Dan Margalit and Joseph Rabinoff
resources.description: Free interactive textbook for linear algebra with visual intuition and worked examples.

resources.title: An Introduction to Measure Theory
resources.author: Terence Tao
resources.description: Graduate-level lecture notes introducing sigma-algebras, integration, and convergence theorems.

resources.title: Graph Theory (Diestel)
resources.author: Reinhard Diestel
resources.description: Author-maintained graph theory text covering foundational and modern graph concepts.

resources.title: Paul's Online Math Notes
resources.author: Paul Dawkins
resources.description: Clear notes and exercises for algebra, calculus, and differential equations.
